mapper.select: select car_number as carId,days,ifnull(activity_price,original_price) as price,animation_type as animationType,car_url AS carUrl, thumbnail_url as thumbnailUrl,car_name as carName from t_funtime_car where id = #{id}

select car_number as carId,ifnull(activity_price,original_price) as price,animation_type as animationType,car_url AS carUrl, thumbnail_url as thumbnailUrl,car_name as carName from t_funtime_car where car_number = #{carId} limit 1
select id from t_funtime_user_car where user_id = #{userId} and car_id = #{carId}

SELECT c.carNumber, c.carName, c.thumbnailUrl, c.carUrl, c.animationType, IF(u.user_id is null,0,1) isOwer, 0 isCurrent, DATE_FORMAT(u.end_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as endTime, CONCAT('剩余',DATEDIFF(u.end_time,now()),'天') content FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT car_number AS carNumber, car_name AS carName, thumbnail_url AS thumbnailUrl, car_url AS carUrl, animation_type AS animationType FROM t_funtime_car where flag = 1 ) c left join t_funtime_user_car u on c.carNumber = u.car_id and u.user_id = #{userId}
SELECT id, days, original_price as originalPrice, activity_price as activityPrice FROM t_funtime_car WHERE car_number =#{carNumber}

SELECT DISTINCT c.car_number AS carNumber, c.car_name AS carName, c.thumbnail_url AS thumbnailUrl, c.car_url AS carUrl, c.animation_type as animationType FROM t_funtime_user_car u INNER JOIN t_funtime_car c ON u.car_id = c.car_number WHERE u.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY c.car_number DESC
SELECT car_id FROM t_funtime_user_car WHERE user_id = #{userId} limit 1
select u.id ,u.user_id as userId,u.car_id as carId from t_funtime_user_car u where now()>u.end_time
mapper.update: update t_funtime_user_car set price = #{price},end_time = date_add(IF(end_time>NOW(),end_time,NOW()), interval ${days} day) where id = #{userCarId}
